title: The New kid
creator_credit: King Screen Productions, Ron Rolla and Dick Gilbert
brief_description: Portrays the difficulties and adjustments that a child faces when they move to a new and unfamiliar neighbourhood. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
